title: Do You Have What It Takes To Lead Change?
description:
Tradition is powerful. How do you lead a church in a new direction when the motivation for change is low (or nonexistent)?

In Season 1, Episode 2 of Tony Morgan's Leadership Unstuck Podcast, Tony talks to Jerry Sweat, Lead Pastor of Beach Church in Jacksonville, Florida about what it takes to lead change. 

Show Links

Leading Change: The Cycle to Expect

Do You Have What It Takes To Lead Change?

Sacred Cow Tipping

Where Your Sacred Cows Come From: Sacred Cow Tipping (Part 2)

Why a Leader Often Needs to Be Mean

4 Ways to Navigate Change in Ministry

Beach Church Website  

 

 

Learn more about The Unstuck Group.
